description: Source files related to the AppGateway plugin of the project, primarily implementing the AppGateway functionality, including classes like AppGateway, AppGatewayImplementation, AppGatewayResponderImplementation, and core modules like Resolver and Module.

classes.name: AppGateway
classes.description: Main class for the AppGateway plugin, responsible for managing the gateway functionality.

classes.name: AppGatewayImplementation
classes.description: Implementation class providing core logic for the AppGateway plugin.

classes.name: AppGatewayResponderImplementation
classes.description: Handles specific responses within the AppGateway plugin.

classes.name: Resolver
classes.description: Class responsible for resolving dependencies or address mappings.

classes.name: Module
classes.description: Represents the module component in the plugin, likely for initialization and configuration.

methods.name: AppGatewayImplementation::Initialize
methods.description: Initializes the implementation specifics of the AppGateway.

methods.name: AppGatewayResponderImplementation::Respond
methods.description: Handles response logic for the AppGateway.

methods.name: Resolver::Resolve
methods.description: Resolves dependencies or references needed in the plugin.
